name: A massive ice encased chestplate
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It increases the users constitution tremendously.
It increases the users wisdom tremendously.
It has superb armour class for its type (awesome in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration impressively.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users cold resistance superbly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
